idea-plugin.name: DevoxxGenie
idea-plugin.description:
Devoxx Genie - Your AI-powered coding assistant for IntelliJ IDEA

üìñ Full Documentation at genie.devoxx.com

Key Features

  • Local & Cloud LLMs: Ollama, LMStudio, GPT4All, OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Groq, and more
  • MCP Support: Model Context Protocol with integrated marketplace for installing servers
  • RAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for semantic code search
  • Web Search: Integrate Google and Tavily search into your prompts
  • Custom Skills: User-defined prompts and commands
  • Chat History: Locally stored conversations
  • Token Cost Calculator: Real-time cost estimation for cloud providers
  • Multi-modal Support: Drag & drop images for vision models

Quick Start

  • Install the plugin
  • For local LLMs: Install Ollama, LMStudio, or GPT4All
  • For cloud LLMs: Add your API keys in Settings
  • Optional: Configure MCP servers from the marketplace
  • Start prompting!

Need help? Visit our Getting Started Guide or check the Troubleshooting page.
